thread.title: Texas-Sized Conversion: U-Haul Acquires Former Speedway Self Storage Facility
thread.title_full: Texas-Sized Conversion: U-Haul Acquires Former Speedway Self Storage Facility - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Texas-Sized Conversion: U-Haul Acquires Former Speedway Self Storage Facility
text:
U-Haul
JUSTIN, Texas , Oct. 1, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- As a new neighbor to Texas Motor Speedway, one of the latest U-Haul stores to open in the Lone Star State is prepared to embrace the need for speed – at least as it pertains to customer service.
U-Haul Company of Texas is pleased to meet the demand for moving and storage needs in Denton County with the opening of its store at 16300 FM 156 S. in Justin . The location is just one mile northwest of the racetrack.
U-Haul Moving & Storage of Justin currently offers more than 550 self-storage units, truck and trailer rentals, moving supplies and boxes. Garner Carey, marketing company president for U-Haul Company of Northwest Dallas , confirmed there is more to come with plans for additional storage, a U-Box warehouse, propane , and hitch and towing installation.
"U-Haul has served the community of Justin for years through our quality independent dealers," Carey said. "With this new location, U-Haul services will expand to include a variety of additional U-Haul products and services while being available seven days a week.
"In addition to state-of-the-art self-storage , this location will offer a full-line selection of moving supplies and U-Box portable storage containers. Plus, we're conveniently located right on Highway 156. We're directly behind Texas Motor Speedway, one of the largest tracks on the NASCAR® circuit. We're just north of Alliance Airport and just south of Denton , not too far from Interstate 35 West."
The 6.94-acre property was formerly the site of Speedway Self Storage. There is 70,170 square feet of net rentable storage, including 233 climate-controlled units. There are 49 RV parking spaces available for rent. Julie Burel serves as the store's general manager.
The acquisition of U-Haul Moving & Storage of Justin was driven by U-Haul Company's Corporate Sustainability initiatives : U-Haul supports infill development to help local communities lower their carbon footprint. Our adaptive reuse of existing buildings reduces the amount of energy and resources required for new-construction materials and helps cities reduce their unwanted inventory of unused buildings.
Contact U-Haul Moving and Storage of Justin at (940) 242-6531 or visit the store from 7 a.m.-7 p.m. Monday-Thursday and Saturday; 7 a.m.-8 p.m. Friday ; and 9 a.m.-5 p.m. Sunday . Reserve equipment at uhaul.com or contact Reservations at 1-800-GO-UHAUL.
To learn more about U-Haul in the news, visit myuhaulstory.com .
About U-Haul
